name: Zombie: Create and Shoot
description:
The world is in a hypothetical danger and of course, it’s zombies are to blame. Needless to say that the salvation of the world lies on your shoulders. The world must be ready to combat against brainless monsters. Run laboratory tests to create an effective anti-zombie weapon. At your disposal is a secret underground laboratory packed with zombie body elements and all necessary weapons. Let’s prevent the Zombocalypse! Destroy the zombies!

Features of these zombie maker and zombie shooting games:
- Work in the zombie laboratory to create male or female silly zombies. Choose and customize face type, skin color, nose, eyes, lips. Make your own characters
- Style the undead with accessorizes: hats, glasses, clothes, piercing, and more;
- Throw everything you have at hand at these brainless creatures and have fun. There’re 11 insane guns you can use to combat the walking dead. Find the best zombie annihilator. It’s only you vs zombies
- This exciting, humorous game is for you, zombie shooter
- Fun zombie games for kids
- Share your creations via social networks
- Save your favorite samples to special vaults

Create
Obviously, only a suicide will try to catch a wild zombie with bare hands. So you need to create a laboratory zombie to run your tests on. Use the storage of zombie pieces. Choose from various face types, skin colors, noses, eyes, lips. Select a hairstyle to make it look like a real zombie: long hair, short cuts, curly or straight hair. Have fun!

Customize
Customize it with clothing and accessories. All this is necessary to distract them from your real mission – weapon testing. Make them think that you created them to release to the big world (tee-hee! Sure!). Pick for them earrings, hats, glasses, beards, moustaches, etc. They’re so silly that will believe you and even start making selfies.

Shoot
Here the real fun comes! Test anti-zombie weapons on your laboratory zombies. Kill zombies with guns and lots of hilarious stuff - pillow, tomato, cake, eggs, flowerpot and boots. Discover a really kick-ass one!

Lock them up to play zombies killing games later
Don’t forget to lock your zombies in special vaults. Yes, zombies are dumb but they’re curious creatures. Make sure nobody escapes the lab. You don’t want the zombies Apocalypse break out beforehand, don’t you?

Share zombi games
Tell everybody you know about the Z Virus. Share your laboratory samples with friends via social networks
